    Setting up a LLM

Function reference

General purpose

sai_assist()
SAI the general assistant
sai_yes_no()
Answer with yes or no

Categorical variables

Help to standardise categorical variables.

sai_fct_sweep() sai_lvl_sweep()
Sweep factor levels to group similar levels together
sai_lvl_match() sai_fct_match()
Match the input factor to supplied levels
sai_lvl_order() sai_fct_reorder()
Reorder levels of an ordinal factor

Language translation

sai_translate()
Translate text from one language to another
sai_is_language()
Determine if the input is a particular language
sai_what_language()
Determine the language of the input text

Describing images

sai_describe_image()
Describe the input image

Model settings and options

sai_get_option() sai_set_option() sai_set_model() sai_set_model_args() sai_set_language()
Get or set an option for the sai package
mistral_model_list()
Get the list of Mistral AI models
ollama_model_list()
Get the list of ollama models available locally
openai_model_list()
Get the list of OpenAI models
as_prompt()
Make it into prompt
is_prompt() is_prompt_user() is_prompt_system() is_prompt_assistant()
Is this a prompt?
prompt_user() prompt_assistant() prompt_system()
Prompt input for the LLM
model_mistral()
Set a model from Mistral AI
model_ollama()
Set the Ollama model
model_openai()
Set an OpenAI model
model_vendor()
Create a list of model and vendor

Datasets

airbnb_listings airbnb_reviews
Airbnb listings and reviews
alcohol
Alcohol warehouse and retail sales
consumer
Amazon consumer reviews
hotel
Hotel reviews
likerts
A collection of different likert scales
messy
A collection of messy inputs
recipes
Recipes
restaurant
Review of Iori restaurant
salary
Ask A Manager Salary Survey 2021
